item.title: Writing Math With Hugo
item.description: I initially attempted to follow the setup of mathematics in content management section of Hugo. Not knowing how it worked, I assumed I can copy and paste these configurations straight out of the box, but this did not work. I wanted to run and I wanted to run fast without first understanding the underlying architecture of Hugo In comes a bit of googling and running into this article by Misha Brukman in Writing Math with Hugo.
